SEARCH

所有类和接口

类
说明
AngleCalculation
A class that handles angle type calculations and scoring in the ShapeVille game.
AngleCalculationPanel
A panel for angle recognition tasks in the Shapeville application.
AreaCalculation
The AreaCalculation class handles the area calculation game logic.
AreaCalculation.ShapeType
Enumeration of supported shape types.
AreaCalculationPanel
A panel for area calculation tasks in the Shapeville application.
BaseTaskPanel
Abstract base class for task panels in the Shapeville application.
CircleCalculation
A class that handles circle-related calculations in the Shapeville application.
CircleCalculation.PracticeType
Enumeration of different practice types for circle calculations.
CircleCalculationPanel
A panel for circle-related calculations in the Shapeville application.
CircleDrawer
A utility class for drawing circles with radius or diameter measurements.
ComplexStairShape
Implementation of the Complex Stair shape (Shape 5 in the list).
CompoundShapeCalculation
Manages the compound shape calculation exercises in the Shapeville application.
CompoundShapeCalculation.CompoundShape
Inner class representing a compound shape with its properties and rendering information.
CompoundShapeCalculationPanel
A panel for compound shape calculations in the Shapeville application.
CompoundShapeCalculationPanel.ShapeDisplayPanel
Internal panel for displaying compound shapes.
CompoundShapeDrawer
Abstract base class for compound shape drawing.
DoubleStairShape
Implementation of the Double Stair shape (Shape 4 in the list).
IrregularShape
Implementation of the Irregular Quadrilateral shape (Shape 6 in the list).
Main
The main entry point for the Shapeville Geometry Learning Application.
MainWindow
The MainWindow class represents the main graphical user interface of the Shapeville application.
ResultWindow
The ResultWindow class displays the final results of a completed task.
SectorCalculation
Manages sector calculations in the Shapeville application.
SectorCalculation.Sector
Inner class representing a sector with its properties and rendering capabilities.
SectorCalculationPanel
A panel for sector calculation exercises in the Shapeville application.
Shape2D
Enumeration of 2D geometric shapes supported in the Shapeville application.
Shape3D
Enumeration of 3D geometric shapes supported in the Shapeville application.
ShapeDrawer
The ShapeDrawer class provides static methods for drawing various geometric shapes with dimensions and measurements.
ShapePanel
The ShapePanel class represents a panel for shape recognition tasks.
ShapeRecognition
The ShapeRecognition class manages the shape recognition game logic.
ShapeRenderer
Interface for compound shape rendering.
StairShape
Implementation of the Stair shape (Shape 2 in the list).
StepShape
Implementation of the Step shape.
TaskPanelInterface
Interface defining the core functionality for task panels in the Shapeville application.
TaskWindow
The TaskWindow class represents the main window for different geometric tasks in Shapeville.
TShape
Implementation of the T shape.
UIManager
The UIManager class is responsible for managing the user interface, task states, and user progress in the Shapeville application.
UIManager.TaskStatus
Enum representing the possible states of a task.
